episode: I'm so annoyed, I feel like I'm the only one who can think between two households

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm so annoyed.  I feel like I'm the only adult between two households that can think.  I have to make the decisions for everyone and it's getting old.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really frustrating. It's tough being the one holding it all together.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It truly is.  It wouldn't be so bad if it was just me thinking for my husband and kid but I also have to do most of the thinking it feels like for my mom and grandma who live 600 miles away

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a lot to handle. No wonder you're feeling overwhelmed.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Overwhelmed might be an understatement

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can't imagine. It's a heavy load.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is.  It would be fine if it was a couple questions here and there or needing help because they don't understand something but good heavens I feel like I can't catch a break and think for myself for just one day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like you're always on call. You deserve some time for yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I can't disagree.  Whenever I carve out time for myself I end up regretting it because my mental load is even more overwhelming after I for example take a day to myself and cut myself off from the world for most of the day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That really sucks. It's like a never-ending cycle.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, it is.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I hear you. It's tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wonder if there's something I'm missing and I'm making it harder on myself without realizing it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe setting some boundaries or asking for more help could lighten the load.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't think I could ask for help because it's things I have to think about, if I try to get someone else to help me on something I usually get a deer in the headlights look

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's tough. Maybe small breaks could help clear your head.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I've tried, it makes things just so much more overwhelming when I try to say I'm going to take x time or x day or whatever.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That really stinks. Maybe tiny breaks during the day?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's not quite enough.  I can usually get a couple hours to myself every day but it really doesn't help at all.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds exhausting.
